summary: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.
cast: Thora Birch|Desmond Harrington|Daniel Brocklebank|Laurence Fox|Keira Knightley|Embeth Davidtz|Steven Waddington|Emma Griffiths Malin|Jemma Powell|Gemma Craven|Anastasia Hille|Kelly Hunter|Maria Pastel|Celia Montague|Kevin Trainor|Lolita Chakrabarti|Claire Fox|Jennifer Hockman|Jack Tanner
title: The hole
